name: RGB++
description:
Overview

Your tasks are as follow : 

- Clear each of the three chambers you see in front of you. 

- Each chamber will have a different puzzle for you to figure out. 

- Once you have cleared them, the final chamber will unlock.

- Clear the final chamber's task and you win.

Controls

Move around using WASD

1,2,3,4,5,6 to "Select Color"

LMB to "Set Color"

Mechanics

Use the ability of being able to change color of certain objects in each chamber to figure out and clear the puzzles in each chamber.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project RBG++ was developed over the span of 6 weeks as part of my "Algorithms, Mathematics and Physics" Module
